awd_titl_txt: A Proposal for a Workshop on Investigations of Lithosphere  Architecture and Development (ILIAD); November, 1994; Taos, New Mexico
awd_abstract_narration: 9415511  Levander    This grant is to provide partial support for a three-day workshop  entitled "Investigations of Lithosphere Architecture and  Development" jointly sponsored by the National Science Foundation,  the Air Force Office of Scientific Research, the U.S. Geological  Survey, and the Incorporated Research Institutes in Seismology  (IRIS).  It will be held in November 1994, in Taos, New Mexico.   The workshop goal is to develop a community organization which will  1) formulate a science implementation plan for new and innovative  study of the continental lithosphere and that complements and  supports the technical plan for seismic instrumentation developed  by IRIS, 2) provide a community forum for exchange of scientific  ideas and experiment design, 3) encourage scientific collaborations  within the community, 4) provide community-wide scientific  consensus on instrumentation needs for lithospheric seismology.  ***
